name: Phantom beta test
description:
This is my first game so almost all the code is from tutorials.

animations by Me,

and models.

controls

  1. move w, a, s, d
  2. shoot left click
  3. aim right click
  4. sprint 'shift' while moving
  5. heal 'Q'
  6. reload 'R'
  7. jump ' space'
  8. return to menu 'press esc' twice to return to menu

enjoy :)
